com.github.brokenswing.comixaire.facades.auth

Class AuthFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.brokenswing.comixaire.facades.Facade
      • com.github.brokenswing.comixaire.facades.auth.AuthFacade

  • public class AuthFacade
extends Facade
    This class provides a simple API to use the authentication system of the application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthFacade

        public AuthFacade(DAOFactory daoFactory,
                  PasswordAlgorithm passAlgo,
                  Session session)
        Parameters:
        daoFactory - The factory to use to access users data
        passAlgo - The password hashing algorithm to use to check users passwords
        session - The session to change the state of when a method of the facade succeeds

    • Method Detail

      • loginStaff

        public void loginStaff(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
                throws BadCredentialsException,
                       InternalException
        Tries to login a staff member which has the given username and the given password. Given username and password are not trimmed before checking against persisted data. If this method does no throw any exception, it means the staff member is now logged in the system.
        This method can be called when an user is already logged in the system : the success of this method call will just override logged in user.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the staff member to log in
        password - the plain password of the staff member to log in
        Throws:
        BadCredentialsException - when no staff member with the given username can be found or that the given password is invalid for the staff member with the given username
        InternalException - when an expected error occurred

      • loginClient

        public void loginClient(java.lang.String cardId)
                 throws BadCredentialsException,
                        InternalException
        Tries to connect a client with the given card ID. Given card ID is not trimmed when checked against system data to retrieve concerned client. If this method does no throw any exception it means that the client with the given card ID is now logged in the system.
        This method can be called when an other user is already called in the system, in the case, the success of this method call just overrides the user that is logged in the system.
        Parameters:
        cardId - the card ID of the client to login to the system
        Throws:
        BadCredentialsException - if no client with the given card ID can be found
        InternalException - when an expected error occurred

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Logs out the currently logged in user of the system. If no user is logged in the system, this method just does nothing.

        public StaffMember getLoggedInStaff()
